mapper.select: select ID, NAME, FOLDER_ID as folderId, FILE_EXTEND_NAME as fileExtendName, FILE_SIZE as fileSize, FILE_DOWNLOAD_CISHU, FILE_MD5, FILE_VERSION as file, IS_RECYCLE, FILE_URL as fileUrl, VIEW_AUTH_USERS, DOWNLOAD_AUTH_USERS, COLLECT_USER, SHARE_CODE, SHARE_PASD, SHARE_TYPE, SHARE_DUE_DATE, ISYL, REMARK, YL_URL, YL_CODE, YL_PATH, YL_COUNT, TB_STATUS, TOTAL_TIME, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE as crDate from FT_File where Folder_ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DEL_FLG="0"
